snippet.title: Minecraft x Tetris®
snippet.description:
Dig into the strategic world of the Tetris® DLC for Minecraft®, where classic 2D Tetris meets the blocky adventures of dungeon crawling! Get ready to stack and whack your way through the ever-changing Matrix dungeon, battling colorful Tetrimonsters and unearthing the dungeon’s secrets. Switch between four gameplay modes and take on this Tetrirrific world with friends in multiplayer. Jazz up your character with several iconic Tetris character customizations, including a free Character Creator item to show off your style. This is a Tetris experience unlike any other!

Read more: Tetris DLC in Minecraft Marketplace | Minecraft 
https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=f684dea8-6dc1-456a-9f5a-8f55fbcc575f
